runs.comm: full awayswinger outside off, Rohit watches it through to the keeper
good length and floats outside off, left alone again
short, top-of-off line, Rohit keeps back, opens the face, and runs it towards point
back of a length and outside off, Rohit stands tall and unfurls a classy punch through cover point
back of a length, much closer to off, holds its line. No shot offered
full and wide, slashed down to third man from outside off
pretty full on off, defensively pushed to mid-on
rising short ball outside off, which is quelled towards point. Rohit got on top of the bounce and played it well
short on off, punchily blocked back to Amjad
this one kicks up further from a short of a length, outside off, Rohit leaps and drops it in front of point
full and outside off, Rohit flows forward and creams a drive to cover, where the fielder fumbles, allowing the ball through him
stump-to-stump line, back of a length, Dhawan pats a quick single to mid-off
picked away off the pads to square leg
tails into the pads again, squirted in front of square leg via an inside edge off the pad
full and slants away far too wide outside off, nothing doing from Dhawan

bumpy ball outside off, slants away, gets big on Dhawan who looks to cut before pulling his bat inside the line. The keeper, the bowler, and slips go up for a caught-behind appeal. Dhawan has snicked that and gets away. It was quite audible on TV. Sharfuddoula, the umpire, does not budge, though. Another umpiring blunder at the Asia Cup
back of a length indipper, catches the thigh pad
another indipper, this one at 140.2ks, inside-edged onto pad
back of a length and just a shade outside off, drags Dhawan forward before whistling past the outside edge
full and straight, Rohit stays back and flicks sweetly through midwicket
full on the stumps, bunted down the ground
full and outside off, Rohit is nailed to the crease as he attempts a cover-drive. He manages an inside edge that whizzes past the off stump. Amjad has his hands on his head
top strike from Rohit. He dances out to meet a length ball. Caressed over the covers. It goes all the way
full and veering into the pads, easy peasy. Rohit picks it from there and twirls it past midwicket
off-stump ball, fuller in length, blocked back
back of a length on middle, jabbed to square leg
dug in short, but not short enough to trouble Rohit. He dismisses it over midwicket with a strong pull
back of a length and extra bounce outside off, Rohit pokes an outside edge past slip
short and angled in, Rohit aims for a pull. Ends up deflecting it towards square leg
back of a length on off, the sound from the bat was delicious. Punched crisply to mid-off
short, angled in, sticks in the pitch and stops on Rohit. He hops up and fends it in front of the bowler. Naveed has overstepped
yorker at the base of middle, from the top draw. Dug out
full and comes in on middle, Rohit flicks it between midwicket and mid-on. Beau-ti-ful
short on off, blocked to cover
back of a length and straight in line, turned to midwicket
dug in outside off, picked up over midwicket with a snap of the wrists
short and wide outside off, begging on its knees to be smashed. Rohit can't put it away. He can only slash this loose ball to third man
pitched up and outside off, Yuvraj leans forward and creams a drive, but the man at cover flings to his right, stops the shot, taking all the sheen off it
back of a length and angled away outside off, left alone
full on off, jabbed back to the bowler off the inside half
back of a length on middle, punched to cover
left alone outside off
full and outside off, laced to cover
length and outside off, gently pushed past the covers. Skips away for four
pitched up and outside off, Yuvraj nails the gap at cover now. He bends his knee and crunches a drive
short on middle, dabbed to cover
back of a length on middle, Dhawan now drops it to cover with soft hands
clipped through square leg
full and outside off, slowish at 122ks, Dhawan flays a drive and edges it, beating the keeper to his left
short on off, Dhawan gets on top of the bounce and pulls it firmly to the left of midwicket
full and outside off, mis-hit to mid-off
Shahzad lands this on a good length and gets it to zing away, foxing Yuvraj
that rockets away to the long-on boundary. Trifle short and outside off, picked up and flicked over midwicket
short and outside off, punched to cover
Yuvraj charges down the track, meets the pitch of this full ball, extends his arms, and hoists it over long-off
length and outside off from round the stumps, run away towards point
tossed up on middle, blocked
fired on off, jabbed to point
slides on off, driven to long-off
Yuvraj steps out and yorks himself. Cracked to cover
Yuvraj steps out, this offering grips in the pitch, turns, and takes the outside edge to third man
hurled at 108.7ks, flicked past midwicket
short and angled in on off, Yuvraj swivels on the back foot and cracks it behind square with a wristy pull to seal India's crushing victory. They win by nine wickets with 59 balls to spare
